TopicTitle: The Ship/Station/Whatever you are most proud of.

Articles.Content:
<link zapped for now>

This is The KSV-Final Hope. I designed her after thinking, how exactly would Kerbals try to find a new home when Kerbin begins to die. The answer is simple Start the longest scientific exploration in Kebal history. This ship holds 11 Kerbals. and has just enough fuel to get to Duna and back. what about you guys? what craft are you proudest of?

Edited August 23, 2015 by technicalfool
